about_the_game:
We are zombie hordes. We are oppressed by mankind for long time. Hundreds of millions of our compatriots were got shot in the head and dismembered in games. We're gonna fight back now. We will smash all the things!

Crowd: Zombie Hordes behave like real crowds


Destruction: Smash all the things!


Spread: Control hundreds of swarming zombies, climbing on top of each other to reach higher levels


Killing: rolls forward to spread and conquer


Are you really ready for the zombie apocalypse?

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages: scenes of blood and disturbing imagery.

detailed_description:
We are zombie hordes. We are oppressed by mankind for long time. Hundreds of millions of our compatriots were got shot in the head and dismembered in games. We're gonna fight back now. We will smash all the things!

Crowd: Zombie Hordes behave like real crowds


Destruction: Smash all the things!


Spread: Control hundreds of swarming zombies, climbing on top of each other to reach higher levels


Killing: rolls forward to spread and conquer


Are you really ready for the zombie apocalypse?

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+
  • Processor: Intel Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX9 (shader model 3.0) or DX11 with feature level 9.3 capabilities
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS 10.6+
  • Processor: Intel Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 650 GTX / AMD Radeon 7850 HD series card
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

name: Zombie Simulator Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 / Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3450
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 560(1024 MB)
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: A Huge Wave of Zombies Are Coming! Control hundreds of swarming zombies to conquer the entire city!
supported_languages:
English*, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
